extendedInfo.description: Startup Manager aims at helping disable/enable startup items from system boot for Android devices including smartphones and tablets. To disable an item from system startup, uncheck the application from the list (recheck to restore and it will start again). For other item that do not start with system boot, please use âCustomizeâ to add and enable it to start with system boot.Supported languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian, and Indonesian. User tab shows all the user applications that have restart function. You can uncheck them all to enhance system startup speed. Long tap an app name will give you access to enable/disable, read application info about, uninstall the app and search the app in Android Market.System tab shows all the system processes that start with system boot. Some processes may not be necessary to start due to our using habits and preferences. Please uncheck these processes only if you know well about the effects of disabling them. If you want to add a new item that does not start with device boot, Customize is the best choice. Besides features above, from Startup Manager Menu - settings you can also select if you want to calculate system startup time and disable system boot sound.Note: For android 2.2 and higher OS non-rooted devices, some processes will restart themselves right after being disabled.Product Features:- Master of Android system's startup entry management- Intelligently analyze and monitor all system startup entries (include user applications and system processes) in the background- Safely disable any undesired application or process from auto-startup at device boot- One click to view detailed properties for each startup entry- Disabled startup entries are stored for future restoration- Add your favorite applications (including 3rd party user apps or system apps) to system startupâ You may also be interested in iMobLife's Top System Utility App "All-In-One Toolbox", which is Free for Download at:http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=imoblife.toolbox.fullorhttp://goo.gl/qC1KKKeywords: startup manager, startup, app management, startup entry, boot up, app cleaner, system app, memory, system management, startup cleaner, power boot manager, power boot, startup management, save battery, speed up, system speed, task killer, manager, taskkiller, taskmanager,  process,  atk, honeycomb apps, tablet apps, honeycomb apps free download, tablet apps free download, honeycomb, android honeycomb, honeycomb applications, android 3.0, honeycomb download, tablet free apps, honeycomb free apps, 3.0, tablet app download, honeycomb app download

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: Straightforward quick set up. Definitely speeds up phone. Clear display. Top marks!
reviews.author: Sarah Curran

reviews.title: Great functionality and control
reviews.comment: No unnecessary application permissions, easy to use, simple and powerful. Great app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Clicked about 30-40 checkboxes and reboot, and I went from 90% memory used to just 50%. Very important app for all Android users!
reviews.author: Jake Wolfe

reviews.comment: Had no effect after rebooting. And was impossible to uninstall
reviews.author: Jay Rosenzweig

reviews.title: ugh
reviews.comment: I\'ve yet to find an app that can shut down an app and stop it from turning back on. As soon as this app (or a task killer) stops a program, it just comes right back again. frustrating and annoying.  I dont understand why so many ppl are giving 5 stars, this doesnt work!
reviews.author: Alexis Marie

reviews.title: Doesn\'t Work (Galaxy S2)
reviews.comment: Very simple, neat UI but unfortunately doesn\'t work on an S2. Removed a bunch of apps from the startup menu, then rebooted. They were all running according to Settings > Apps.
reviews.author: Jonny Martyr

reviews.title: great apps
reviews.comment: simple UI. not found any lag. tiny installer   great. now i am not found any bug.   great app. keep update 5 stars for you
reviews.author: Sutama Tamasu

reviews.title: Vital app!
reviews.comment: This app puts control back in the user\'s hands.  Stops useless apps from running and using precious resources on one\'s smart phone.  Highly recommended!
reviews.author: Al Sanchez

reviews.title: Surprise! Absolutely Nothing...
reviews.comment: Does nothing, does not stop programs from starting up.  Very weak at best.
reviews.author: Joel Chairez

reviews.title: You Must Get This!
reviews.comment: Got a slow phone? Text messaging program taking FOREVER to load? Get this program. Go to the TASK KILLER tab. Select all. Then KILL SELECTED. Do not worry, the operating system and essential systems will be OK. You now have a fast phone like when you bought it. You are welcome!  :).  :).
reviews.author: Bliss Bonanza

reviews.title: GREAT APP! TAKE CONTROL OF YOUR PHONE!
Useless
reviews.comment: I selected my apps to not boot up when I reboot my phone... and as soon as I reboot it they all open themselves back up... wow
reviews.author: Ahron Neil

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: complete waste of time. all apps started up. the app did nthg !
reviews.author: Bahaa Hamza

reviews.title: Excellent and essential for rooter phones and custom ROMs
reviews.comment: Start Manager does a great job at keeping my starting memory  requirements down for those of us with many apps and rooted phones. It is essential.
reviews.author: Antonio Otero

reviews.title: O+
reviews.comment: Quickly solved my Bluetooth that won\'t enable on my mobile phone.  Head ache buster :-)
reviews.author: Ric Hernando

reviews.title: Does not work!
reviews.comment: The app is useless and has no effect on the services that must not run.
reviews.author: Kurien Mathew

reviews.title: Must have application!
reviews.comment: Highly efficient and easy to use!  Significantly increases the start up  time and improve the performance. Thx
reviews.author: Pavel Karapetyan
